agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides in-home school readiness, including science, mentoring relationships, and innovative technologies programs.
service_description: Offers an in-home, early education program sponsored by the State of Indiana (and administered by FSSA). The at-home school readiness program, includes a computer and internet access at no cost. Children develop foundational reading, math, science, and social-emotional skills. Provides positive parent-child interactions while delivering personalized, online instruction 30 minutes a day, 5 days a week, the year before children start school. Also provides parent coaches, fun educational activities.
site_details: Call or visit the website to register.
site_eligibility: Age 4-5 years-old (the year before Kindergarten) -- At or below 127% Federal Poverty Level
